tutorial.speak:
Before we create our first classroom, let's set up a volunteer team and a parent group. This will help get the right information to your teachers. Click your profile icon in the top right.
Click Switch App, then select B1 dot church.
You're now in the Member Portal. Click your name in the top right.
Select Admin Portal.
This is the B1 dot church Dashboard where you can manage your church.
Click the Dashboard dropdown and select Serving.
We need to create a Ministry first. Click Add Ministry.
Enter a name for your ministry.
Type Children's Ministry and click Add.
Click Manage to configure your ministry.
Click the Teams tab.
Click Create Team.
Enter a name like Elementary Teachers and click Add.
Now let's create a parent group. Click the Dashboard dropdown and select People.
Click Groups in the top navigation.
Click Add Group.
Click the Category Name dropdown and select Add New.
Enter Parents as the category and Parents Of Elementary Kids as the group name, then click Add.
Your parent group is now created.
Let's head back to Lessons dot church. Click your profile icon and select Switch App.
Click Lessons dot church.
You're back in Lessons dot church with your volunteer team and parent group ready. Click Add First Classroom to continue.
